title: River (Planet earth)
creator_credit: Peter Raymont, Planet Earth and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Takes a look at the Saskatchewan-Nelson river system in order to examine the impact which a water system has upon the economy, sociology and ecology of a nation.
